= Support for Cat =

If you need help using Cat on a project, we encourage you to use the [http://groups.google.com/group/catlanguage discussion forum]. If you have identified a bug with the Cat interpreter, or want to make a feature request you can also report it using the [http://code.google.com/p/cat-language/issues/list issue reporting form].

If you are planning on using Cat for a large commercial project, and need extended support [ChristopherDiggins Christopher Diggins], the designer of Cat, is available for consulting.
